# Overview

There are four sections. Those with least experience should start with the first but more experienced users might start at 3 or 4.

1. [Using RStudio projects](experience_rs_projects.html). How to organise your work in a logical, consistent and reproducible way using RStudio Projects, appropriate directory structures and portable code. It will set you up for later sections.

2. [Tidying data and the tidyverse including the pipe.]()

3. [Advanced Data Import]()

3. [Formatting figures]()
